column5: Thank you so much.

Don‚Äôt say it back unless you mean it. And it‚Äôs okay to not know if you love him or not. When you do, you‚Äôll know. Just give it time and if he questions why you didn‚Äôt say it back, just tell him you appreciate his gesture, but you‚Äôre not ready yet.
Especially since it‚Äôs been 4 months, you should be feeling better, not worse. I hope everything works out for you!
Their turn over rate is high. I never thought about telling them I got another offer. That‚Äôs smart. Thank you!
I guess I just feel kind of embarrassed for leaving after such a short time and I‚Äôm afraid to try and explain myself to my less-than-understanding boss. Thanks for the advice!
I took Zoloft for a month or two. It wiped me of all emotion; I was practically a zombie. Talk to your doctor about your side effects and maybe they can try another SSRI.
Maybe

He doesn‚Äôt really enjoy dates anymore. I feel like I‚Äôm dragging him out to go on a date. And I do call him sexy and that seems to be the only time I hear it back. I‚Äôm trying my best. Thank you for your advice! I appreciate it.
We use to play games together and it was great. I‚Äôll have to try that again. I‚Äôm hoping this little bump in the road blows over soon. Thank you very much!

You‚Äôre 12. You don‚Äôt need to be having sex.
No problem! The welcome post lists some symptoms of depersonalization disorder which may give you some answers.
You may be able experiencing depersonalization r/depersonalization

There is always a honeymoon phase in relationships. Some last longer than others. I get how you feel, though. I miss my boyfriend telling me how in love with me he his at random moments. I miss how he use to look at me like I was the prettiest girl he‚Äôs seen. I miss all of that, but now we just roast each other too. Which is fine, it‚Äôs just hard not to miss those sweet little things.
Fingers crossed. Let me know if it‚Äôs him!
Sounds like you‚Äôre suffering from depersonalization/Derealization. I‚Äôve suffered from it pretty well my entire life. You may find some answers or relief in r/depersonalization .
NTA. You did the right thing. I‚Äôm sure she‚Äôs grateful. :)
NTA. Bitch had it coming.
I think you may be experiencing depersonalization/Derealization disorder r/Depersonalization may give you some answers. I suffer from it too.
I just wanted to say, I started giving her baby cereal and pedialyte and she has finally started to gain some weight back. Thank you so much!!!
He lied about the same thing multiple times. Even looking me in the eyes and promising. He ended up telling me today that he lied about it, he said he had to so that I wouldn‚Äôt get mad.
He kept saying he‚Äôs sorry and won‚Äôt do it again. It‚Äôs hard for me to believe that because well... he lied once so why wouldn‚Äôt he lie again?
Not just you.
NTA. Your uncle is the asshole.

NTA. You‚Äôre never the asshole for speaking up about management. Good on you for doing it. I don‚Äôt get why managers get this special treatment where nobody can critique them. Your manager seems shitty and you seem like an hard worker not getting what you deserve. I hope this brings out a better outcome for you and your workplace.
Don‚Äôt put yourself in the situations that break it. I learned that the hard way.
This is pure genius.

Your school needs a new therapist. Depression is real and being on your period has nothing to do with the way you‚Äôve been feeling since you were 12. That‚Äôs just her excuse for saying ‚ÄúI have no clue what I‚Äôm talking about.‚Äù 

You do have a reason to live. There‚Äôs always a reason and being young it‚Äôs quite hard. You have school and you‚Äôre not quite free. It takes time. I‚Äôm 18 and hated my life up until I turned 18. Yeah, I still had depression and my anxiety was through the roof, but it was a new sense of freedom and hope that I hope you feel too. You can also find a new therapist. It‚Äôs best to speak to someone about and release your emotions to someone other than that jank school counselor. 

My messages are always open if you need a talk. But, no you‚Äôre not just a ‚Äúmoody teenager.‚Äù Your feelings are REAL. Your emotions are REAL.

You didn‚Äôt mean for this to happen so I wouldn‚Äôt say you‚Äôre an asshole. Decide who you want because it seems like you won‚Äôt be able to have both. If you want your ex back, try to talk through your issues and stop seeing Iris. However, if you still have a strong connection to Iris, I would let it go with your ex. It‚Äôs a tough situation, but I don‚Äôt think your ex will ever accept Iris and even rekindling could cause a lot of insecurity problems.
Hypothyroidism can be genetic.
Do you feel like there‚Äôs a barrier between you and the world? Or like you‚Äôre watching yourself live from third person?

That‚Äôs how I felt before I recovered. Depression was comfortable for me and although I was so sad, I didn‚Äôt want it to go away. That was until I recovered and life is finally looking up. I‚Äôm happy I recovered, but also happy that I used to be depressed because that made me who I am. I even have a little sad face finger tattoo to commemorate that time in my life.
A living sleep mask. What else could you ask for?
What a lil legend.
That could be a start? Maybe see if you feel better by drinking water when you have those spells.
I‚Äôm no doctor so my advice/questions are null. But do you drink a lot of water? Doctors have blamed my symptoms on dehydration as well.

It feels like you‚Äôre running out of oxygen. When I would go to the ER, I would BEG to be put on oxygen. They would tell me my oxygen levels were great and I didn‚Äôt need it, but I could NOT get my breath. It just felt shallow and took a lot of work to get air in. Do you have chest pain too?
Sorry it wasn‚Äôt much of advice. It‚Äôs hard to cope with. Especially when it feels like life or death.

The only way I cope through it now is accepting it honestly. I use to end myself up in the ER every time and get the typical ‚Äúshe‚Äôs crazy‚Äù treatment. They would tell me it‚Äôs an anxiety attack and I would tell them ‚ÄúI have pain in my heart. It has caused a panic attack, but the pain and shortness of breath isn‚Äôt a panic attack.‚Äù After so many times, I stopped going and just accepted that if something‚Äôs going to happen, then I can‚Äôt stop it. That sucks superrr bad, but I have no other choice. :(

I don‚Äôt think my depersonalization is from health anxiety, but I do have health anxiety too. Just like you said, I‚Äôm always afraid I‚Äôm having a heart attack. I have severe chest pain almost everyday, feel faint, etc. The cardiologist says I‚Äôm fine, but I‚Äôm convinced I‚Äôm not. 

I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôre okay. It‚Äôs rough feeling like you‚Äôre going to die and nobody finds anything wrong.
Are you on medication for your cholesterol? It could be an anxiety attack.
Thank you so much!!

I don‚Äôt really have any answer for you, but I‚Äôve wondered the same thing. I‚Äôve had no significant trauma, haven‚Äôt done drugs (before I got DPD), etc. I only have memories from 5 years old and forward and that‚Äôs when I started getting DP episodes. It makes me wonder if there WAS in fact trauma before I was able to form conscious memories (1-4 years old). 

I‚Äôve done extensive research on it too and have found nothing I can consciously relate to. I‚Äôm curious if there‚Äôs any physical changes in the brain that causes it randomly.
Any reason to close the store is a win in my book.

I second this. Validate his feelings because they are REAL. That doesn‚Äôt mean everyone hates him. He may have had an expectation that wasn‚Äôt met and his BPD just threw him over the edge. That‚Äôs how I am. If things don‚Äôt go the way I expect them to, it can send my anxiety through the roof and I will overthink to no end.

Anxiety is the worst. I‚Äôve had crippling anxiety for the past 5 years or so. After medications that didn‚Äôt work or gave me awful side effects, I finally found one that changed the game for me.

Medication isn‚Äôt always the answer, but it‚Äôs an option. Talking and reasoning through your anxiety attacks is good although it‚Äôs easier said than done. 

Anxiety is awful and I‚Äôm so sorry you have to deal with it. I hope you find relief one day soon.
AND they won‚Äôt put an ‚Äòx‚Äô on the bottle...

I always wondered why they‚Äôve never done an x-ray. I‚Äôll ask about it!
And I‚Äôll try to mix some pedialyte with baby food to see if that will help. Thank you very much!
You‚Äôre right. He knows I hate when he leaves, but doesn‚Äôt know the extent of it I guess. I‚Äôll talk to him about it next time my anxiety runs high from him leaving. Thank you!
Not to be dramatic, but I‚Äôd die for this rat.

That‚Äôs exactly how I feel. I take up most of his free time as well. I feel like he will never come back when he leaves or he‚Äôs sick of me. I‚Äôm pretty sure he already finds me a little crazy, so I don‚Äôt talking to him about it would do any good.

It causes issues for me. I hate feeling like this when I‚Äôm alone. As for our relationship, he knows I hate when he‚Äôs gone, but I really try to keep my mouth shut about the extent of it. I don‚Äôt think it overly negatively affects us. I hope it never does.
I have. She seemed shocked by it, but not too concerned. It hasn‚Äôt really been brought up again.
He won‚Äôt be with me tonight (so no hugs), but I know how lucky I am. Love him so much.

Yes! I see my boyfriend about 5 days a week and that still never seems good enough. Whenever I‚Äôm not with him I‚Äôm incredibly anxious and depressed and lonely. I just can‚Äôt seem to be without him. Even when we fight, the worst thing he could do is leave because it will send me into a panic attack.

I just started at an independent pharmacy last week after a year at Walgreens. I couldn‚Äôt stand the hell of understaffing, rude patients, a store manager who also hasn‚Äôt stepped foot in the pharmacy but would be sure to berate you before going in, money greed, and encouraged abuse from patients. 

I‚Äôm still trying to get a hang of the new system, but let‚Äôs just say the wait time from Walgreens was an hour and now, at the independent pharmacy, is 10 minutes. They have 3-4 techs at a time, sometimes 2 pharmacists. They deliver so 95% less foot traffic. Best decision I ever made and sounds like yours too.

I‚Äôm so happy to hear more people getting away from retail. In fact, my new pharmacy just hired my co-worker from Wags! Everybody needs to GET OUT - it‚Äôs only getting worse.

I can‚Äôt remember what I‚Äôve eaten most of the time. I can‚Äôt remember a lot of what happened in past relationships. I can‚Äôt remember memories that I should.
I feel terrible when my boyfriend mentions something from the beginning of our relationship that is super sweet and I can‚Äôt remember or only have a vague sense of familiarity. It sucks.

Can‚Äôt stand when patients would sit and talk to me when there is a line of 8 waiting for their scripts. I just look over and IM being mean-mugged by them because somebody wants to make unnecessary small talk.

I have the same problem. It feels like there is a barrier between me and my skin. Like everything I touch my brain knows I‚Äôm touching, but I can‚Äôt FEEL it. 
It used to be worse. I would have a hard time feeling pain and temperature. I could sit outside in freezing whether without shivering or could handle being pinched as hard as possible without a flinch.
I‚Äôm sorry you have to go through this. I hope you can recover from it as soon as possible.

I know DPDR is scary. I‚Äôm a long time sufferer and I know that fear. If yours came from this idea of a simulation, maybe trying not to dwell on it or trying to focus on other things would allow your brain to move on from it. Try grounding techniques. The usual see something, hear something, taste something, feel something, and smell something. Keep yourself as close to reality as you can.
I‚Äôm glad you have a therapist you can talk to. It is important to talk about it because DPDR is real and it‚Äôs hard. Try to relax yourself in any way you can and resume your life as normal. Hoping this goes away for you soon.

I‚Äôm so attached to him and this just eats me up. I don‚Äôt want to feel ‚Äútwo-timed‚Äù but I know that‚Äôs how it will always be.

Thank you for your advice, I‚Äôll think on it. Just struggling a lot here and the advice is so appreciated.

I know leaving him makes the most sense. I don‚Äôt think I could ever bring myself to do it. That is unless they are flirtatious or what not at the birth. I won‚Äôt stay.

I‚Äôm having such a hard time with this. Thank you so much for your empathy and advice. I was crying because of how understanding you are. Nobody really gets it. Thank you again. I‚Äôll consider what you‚Äôve told me.

I think leaving him would be worse for me. I feel like I can‚Äôt live without him. I hate feeling that way but it‚Äôs true.
It‚Äôs such a hard situation. The baby is being born tomorrow and it‚Äôs all so overwhelming. I‚Äôm sick to my stomach at the thought of him having feelings for her.
Yes
RemindMe! 365 days

My dilemma comes because Sweetie (and her sister, Craze) are very healthy and active for their age. They still scale the walls of their triple critter nation. They don‚Äôt even seem 2 years old. I don‚Äôt want to cut her life span early because of cancer, but I also don‚Äôt want her to suffer through chemo. If it is in fact cancer, it doesn‚Äôt seem to have metastasized yet. The tumor she just had removed was growing over a span of 2 months and she hasn‚Äôt had any other lumps or anything. 

My vet has done ~10 (benign) tumor removals between the 2 of my girls (my fault for not spaying) and their deslorelin implant. I hope she can give me some advice on which to do. It‚Äôs hard and scary. The thought of losing her is unbearable.  Still hoping it is benign. 

Thank you for your advice and experience, I appreciate it a lot.

No, I really appreciate it. I asked my vet about it and she said couldn‚Äôt tell me, legally, because there isn‚Äôt enough research.

I‚Äôm getting 100% hemp plant. Did your solution have THC? Hope I‚Äôm not going to get you or myself in trouble for this.
That‚Äôs how I feel too.

Sometimes I look down at my body when sitting in the car or something and just feel like it‚Äôs not even my body. So I lift my hands up to look at them and get anxious because it feels like I‚Äôm floating ‚Äúabove‚Äù my body or something.
Episodes since I was 5, went into full dpdr when I was 10. 8 years in full dpdr with no break. (18 now, and still in constant dpdr)
What is ayuvasca? And there are so many therapies that I didn‚Äôt even know existed until I made this post. I‚Äôll have to try them. Hopefully something works. Fingers crossed.
I haven‚Äôt tried lamotrigine. That‚Äôs a good suggestion. I‚Äôll bring these things up with my therapist. Thank you!
That‚Äôs awesome! Keep pushing through.

I used it to try and feel something. It feels like there is constantly a barrier between me and my skin (if that makes any sense). So, I figured cutting would make there feel like a less of a disconnect. 

I don‚Äôt use self harm for DPD anymore, but just as a coping mechanism for anxiety and depression now.
I‚Äôm so glad something worked for you. I wish I had a little magic pill so bad. I‚Äôve kind of given up on prescription medication.
Thank you for the suggestion!

Hopefully yours goes away soon. It seems like you have hope which is awesome. Keep us updated on how you recover. 

I haven‚Äôt tried any psychedelics. I‚Äôm a bit scared of them and am not sure where to get them, how to take them, etc. It‚Äôs a new option, though, so I am actually quite open to it and will look into it. Any specific hallucinogens you have in mind? Shrooms?

It‚Äôs an awful, scary feeling. I appreciate your understanding of it. It‚Äôs so hard to live with it, especially since it‚Äôs invisible and no one can see how bad you‚Äôre struggling.

Have you been in constant depersonalization since April? Have you found any relief?

Lexapro made me feel like a zombie. Completely washed me of all emotion. I was on Prozac for over a year, but it never affected my depersonalization. I was considering an anti-psychotic like Seroquel since it is a ‚Äúdisconnect from reality.‚Äù
